Reference

All functions

company_properties()

Extract a table of company IDs and simple property values

contact_properties()

Extract a table of contact IDs and simple property values

deal_associations()

Extract a table of associations from a deals list

deal_pipeline_stages()

Extract a table of pipeline IDs and stages

deal_pipelines()

Extract a table of pipeline IDs and property values

deal_properties()

Extract a table of deal IDs and simple property values

deal_properties_history()

Retrieve the changes of all properties for a given set of deals

deal_stages_history()

Retrieve the version history of deal stages

get_companies()

Get a list of all companies, including a set of properties

get_company_properties()

Retrieve available properties for companies

get_contact_properties()

Retrieve available properties for contacts

get_contacts()

Get a list of all contacts, including a set of properties

get_deal_pipelines()

Retrieve available pipelines for deals

get_deal_properties()

Retrieve available properties for deals

get_deals()

Get a list of all deals, including a set of properties

get_owners()

Retrieve owners

hubspot_api_usage()

Check daily API usage

hubspot_key_get()

Get the Hubspot secret API key

hubspot_key_set()

Set the Hubspot secret API key

owners()

Extract a table of CRM owners
